content.rendered:
The Thekwini College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Thekwini College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Thekwini College based on the information provided within it.

Thekwini College Student Portal

Note: Thekwini College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Thekwini College Prospectus 2024

The Thekwini College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.feta.gov.za/.

Thekwini College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

see also Umfolozi College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
